original_title: アイ・オーダー・ユー
overview: Twenty-four-year-old Mari is in love with a pizza delivery man. His beautiful shoes, hands, and eyes have stolen her heart. She's ordered the same pizza 44 times just to see him again. One day, unable to hold back her feelings any longer, she fortifies herself with some wine, gathers up her courage, and runs out of the room to talk to him.
title: I Order You
